name: Slide Balls - Block Breaker
description:
This is a really new fresh free-to-play arcade game enjoyment for all classic Balls snake clear bricks fans.

Download for free.There is no in-app purchase.

Unique mix between brick breaker and balls shooter games, perfect time killer to spend your leisure time.

Over hundreds of challengeable levels, clear the stages by eliminating bricks on the board. This dancing balls fire up brick breaker block game is going to be a hit!

HOW TO PLAY?
Swipe your finger and throw balls, break all bricks and finish all puzzle challenges. Boost your score by skills and concentration, time to challenge and shoot balls with your friends now!

Like the classic balls shooter game, you need to focus on balls chain, release your balls snake and shoot balls, bounce your ball chain and brick all bricks. Dancing ballz fire up bricks is suitable for players who love ball bricks breaker puzzle games, classic arcade games, searching for the best casual arcade game like bouncy balls, kick balls games and free block breaker games.

Download for free today, relax your brain in the addicted dancing ballz fire up bricks game world!
